---
imports: import { Editor, EmojiNode, EditorToolbar, RichEditor, EmojiPlugin } from "@sparrowengg/twigs-editor-react";
---

```jsx live play=editor-feature-emoji
<Editor nodes={[EmojiNode]}>
  <EditorToolbar />
  <RichEditor placeholder="Type : to trigger emoji dropdown" />
  <EmojiPlugin />
</Editor>
```
